name: Dominance of Earth
description: When your Zhongli, who has this card equipped, has at least 7 HP, the DMG dealt by Zhongli and the Geo DMG from your Summons +1.
descriptionraw: When your $[A1603], who has this card equipped, has at least 7 HP, the DMG dealt by $[A1603] and the $[K106] from your Summons +1.
descriptionreplaced: When your Zhongli, who has this card equipped, has at least 7 HP, the DMG dealt by Zhongli and the {SPRITE_PRESET#2106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color> from your Summons +1.
